attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Scrap income-tax on all pensions! 
This will put the basic rate of tax up, but, I would rather TAX now and benifit later.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
